article_title: Hollywood Actress Attacked By Angry Libs After What She Just Said About Obamacare
article_text:
They took her joke very, very seriously.

Advertisement - story continues below

Sarah Michelle Gellar, most famous for her role as “Buffy” in Buffy the Vampire Slayer, announced on Twitter Tuesday that she finally got her Instagram account verified after three months. Gellar sarcastically blamed the delay on one of the most controversial pieces of legislation in recent history.

Gellar later clarified that it was a joke:



Advertisement – story continues below

Inevitably, there were people who took it very, very seriously:

Gellar stressed again that it was indeed a joke:

Advertisement – story continues below

There were people, however, who saw right through the joke and came to her defense:



h/t: Politistick
